headline.main: EDISON CREATES A 'WAR CABINET'; Action Leaves in Doubt Future of Defense Council -- New Group Has 3 Branches WILLIAMS HEADS MILITARY Leonard Dreyfuss in Charge of Civilian Unit -- Schoeffel to Direct Police Work

lead_paragraph: TRENTON, Dec. 31 (AP) -- A Governor's Executive War Cabinet was appointed today by Governor Charles Edison, and the future course of the State Defense Council, composed mostly of key State officials, was left in doubt.
abstract: Conflict of authority with new Exec War Cabinet seen
snippet: TRENTON, Dec. 31 (AP) -- A Governor's Executive War Cabinet was appointed today by Governor Charles Edison, and the future course of the State Defense Council, composed mostly of key State officials, was left in doubt....
